conversations.body_text: Hi Jerome Metze,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Your order is already on its way and is expected to arrive around the 24th. Please cancel your chargeback.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047152632591

Good morning,

Thank You for the Mail.

According to my app, this is the tracking for the haptic motors. However, I
ordered pedals with the base plate from you. The base plate is missing from
my box. The pedals are there.

Please confirm that the tracking is for the base plate of the pedals.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

Jerome Metze

Jerome.Metze@gmail.com


service@simsonn.com
Hi Jerome Metze,     This is the logistics tracking link for your pedal.
